video.title: Untamed Americas
video.synopsis: Explore untamed terrains and follow the most deadly animals throughout the Americas, from the deserts and the coasts to the mountains and the forests.

episodes.synopsis: A newborn shark must escape a looming hurricane, penguins perform mating jigs, and giant squid devour their kin.
episodes.title: Coasts

episodes.synopsis: Creatures like bats, mustangs and even penguins find amazing ways to survive in the world's most arid deserts.
episodes.title: Deserts

episodes.synopsis: Spider monkeys, river dolphins and spirit bears make lives under the tree canopies of the Amazon, and a jaguar stalks its lunch -- a caiman crocodile.
episodes.title: Forests

episodes.synopsis: Bears hunt in Wyoming, sheep butt horns in the Rockies, pumas prey in the Andes and an exotic bat that no one knew existed intrigues explorers.
episodes.title: Mountains
